p: In addition to Javascript, Reeborg, and all the other robots, know the following instructions:
To create additional robots, one can use new UsedRobot()
In addition, the following commands are available and are not tied to any robot in particular.
In some more advanced lessons, and especially in some programming challenges, the following are also used:

ul.li: take(shape) where shape is one of "triangle", "square", "star"
put(shape) where shape is one of "triangle", "square", "star"

p: To find out more, follow the lessons.
